Thank you

post_text: GCPS Pre-school students learned how to shuck corn. They used corn that was grown on the Giles County Agriculture Land Lab. On the first day, they shucked the corn. On the second day, the cafeteria staff cooked the same corn and the students ate the delicious, home-grown vegetable!!
